title: Opulent Riverside Duplex with Modern Luxury in Krosno Old Town
description: Experience premium living in this meticulously designed 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom duplex in the heart of Krosno’s historic Old Town. Spanning a generous 178 sqm, the residence features high-end finishes, a sleek modern kitchen with Bosch appliances, a quaint outdoor dining terrace, and an energy-efficient building profile that blends comfort with conscience. Spacious interiors include a private master suite with a walk-in closet, perfect for unwinding in palpable elegance. Outdoor areas are thoughtfully planned for relaxation or chic al-fresco dining perfect for parties—and pets!
neighborhood_description: Nestled in a rapidly developing riverside area, Old Town provides the perfect environment for those who desire a harmonious proximity to Krosno’s newly modernized business district and picturesque waterfront walks. New tech startups and innovative venues offer an urban, forward-thinking vibe in a relaxed setting, ideal for residents looking to enjoy peace without compromising access to luxury amenities. Nearby highways ensure fast, convenient travel by car to all parts of the region.
lifestyle_benefits: suitable for remote work or home office
target_buyer: Ideal for luxury-seeking families or pet owners desiring both modern comfort and plenty of private outdoor space, within reach of the business district and celebrated riverside paths.
market_positioning: This property positions at the top tier of the Krosno market, offering rare dual advantages—bespoke interior lifestyle in an emerging tech-oriented area plus classic Old Town charm. An exclusive opportunity, situated near the waterfront yet away from city bustle, unmatched in this price range.
